param.name: custom_pages
param.label: Custom SSL-pages
param.description: List of custom URLs to redirect to SSL; each entry on a new line

param.name: loggedin
param.label: SSL when Logged-in
param.description: Force SSL for all pages when an user is logged in

param.name: custom_php
param.label: Custom PHP-code
param.description: PHP script to evaluate. Returning 'true' will redirect to HTTPS.

param.name: exclude_components
param.label: Exclude components
param.description: Exclude components from being redirect to or from SSL

param.name: all
param.label: Redirect all to SSL
param.description: Simple flag to enforce SSL to all pages

param.name: redirect_nonssl
param.label: Redirect non-SSL to SSL
param.description: If a non-SSL page is encountered, that should be SSL, perform a redirect

param.name: redirect_ssl
param.label: Redirect SSL to non-SSL
param.description: If a SSL page is encountered, that should be non-SSL, perform a redirect
